title: Preview: Tech makes midweek stop in Abilene - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Preview: Tech makes midweek stop in Abilene - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: LUBBOCK, Texas – Texas Tech softball (21-20) will play just its second midweek contest of the season when the Red Raiders travel southeast to Abilene to face Abilene Christian (19-23) Wednesday at 5:00 p.m. at Poly Wells Field.
